|rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |nqam3 = 400 |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''HELIOS-EX Tri-Band with DirectLink'' :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/re2200t.html}} dead link :{{SupportPage|vendor=Amped|model = re2200t}} dead link The product page claims 128MB of RAM but FCC docs show a 256MB chip. {{FCC ST|07/09/2017|indexme.}} {{See also|Amped Wireless RTA2200T}} ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10978/amped-wireless-launches-ac2200-helios-family-with-qualcomms-triradio-80211ac-solution ''Amped Wireless Launches AC2200 HELIOS Family with Qualcomm's
Tri-Radio 802.11ac Solution'' on '''AnandTech'''] :AC2200: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ40x9 + QCA9886 :AC3000: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ40x9 + QCA9984 ==See also== *[[Amped Wireless RTA2200T]] - ''High Power AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
